text: Willem (Wim) Betz (22 February 1943 â€“ 8 June 2019) was a Belgian physician. He was a professor emeritus at the Belgian university Vrije Universiteit Brussel (VUB) until November 2007. Betz was a leading skeptic in Flanders and participant in the EU COST B4 Project. He was a founding member and vice- president of the Belgian skeptic organisation SKEPP. Betz died on 8 June 2019 at the age of 76.Arts en scepticus Wim Betz overleden ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Belgian physicians Category:Belgian academics
title: Wim Betz
